name: My Journey To Mars
description:
This game was made in 14 hours (so enjoy it as it is :) )
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Nothing is worse than a slime invasion in the last day of the week, specially if it's the day of the journey to Mars ... Faisal ,the player character, decided to get rid of all the slimes to cut his path to the Bridge between Sharjah, the city where he lives, and the bridge to mars !

Disclaimer : This game is 100% imaginary, so don't be moody :)

Good Luck

Have Fun
